task.title: Steps in revoking or modifying a user's permissions

context.p: The following steps outline the process of using the Modify user roles wizard of the IHTSDO Workbench IDE to revoke permissions of a user :

step.cmd: Invoke the Modify user role wizard from the Admin menu in the Administrator's Window of the Workbench. If the Administrator's window is not visible, select it or open it from the Window menu. An interactive form appears in the editor's top toolbar. This form can be stepped through using the step buttons provided.

fig.title: Step 1: Choose to revoke user permissions

step.cmd: Choose the user/hierarchy/role combination to revoke.

fig.title: Step 2: choose the user/hierarchy/role combination to revoke

postreq.note: Steps 1 and 2 can be repeated without leaving the grant form. Permissions can be revoked or additional permissions granted at a later date via the Admin -> Modify User Role wizard.
